note:
Incorrigible walker, lover of cities and human settlements, functional cyclist, snack-motivated, hyphenated-Canadian, and thrives in a mix of order and chaos. Also, coffee (and tea).

Ident: CBC
Work: Design, Policy, and Governance
Play: Urban Exploration, Moss, Tiny Critters
